label: 悪党
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: literally, “evil bands.” They were accused of stealing crops, murdering residents, torching houses, and wreaking havoc in general. The term can be seen too as a legal designation for those opposed by the shogunate and other elites.
